	 Test Name : tests.app.AppWebContext
	 Test Assertion : All Web modules in the application have a non-blank context-root. Please refer to JavaEE 5 Platform Specification Section #8.3.1c  for further information.

	 Test Name : tests.IconImageTypeTest
	 Test Assertion : The icon type contains small-icon and large-icon elements that specify the file names for small and large GIF, JPEG, or PNG icon images used to represent the parent element in a GUI tool. GIF, JPEG are supported till J2EE 1.4, PNG type has been introduced in JAVA EE 5. The specified files should be packaged inside the bundle containing this deployment descriptor. Please refer to J2EE 1.4 Platform Specification section #8.6 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1 ]
No errors were detected.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.session.TransientFieldsSerialization
	 Test Assertion : The Bean Provider should not store in a transient field a reference to any of the following objects: SessionContext object; environment JNDI naming context and any its subcontexts; business interfaces; home and component interfaces; EntityManager interface; EntityManagerFactory interface; UserTransaction interface Please refer to EJB 3.0 Specification Section #4.2.1 for further information.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.session.SessionSynchronizationInterface
	 Test Assertion : Only a stateful session bean with container-managed transaction demarcation may implement the SessionSynchronization interface. A stateless session bean must not implement the Session-Synchronization interface. Please refer to EJB 3.0 Specification Section #4.3.7 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#GestoreLineaMagazzinoBean ]

	 Test Assertion : A business interface must not extend javax.ejb.EJBObject or javax.ejb.EJBLocalObject. Please refer to EJB 3.0 Simplified API Section #3.2 for further information.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.ejb30.CallbacksOnBeanClass
	 Test Assertion : If the PostConstruct lifecycle callback interceptor method is the ejbCreate method, if the PreDestroy lifecycle callback interceptor method is the ejbRemove method, if the PostActivate lifecycle callback interceptor method is the ejbActivate method, or if the Pre-Passivate lifecycle callback interceptor method is the ejbPassivate method, these callback methods must be implemented on the bean class itself (or on its superclasses). 	 Test Name : tests.ejb.ejb30.CallbacksOnBeanClass
	 Test Assertion : If the PostConstruct lifecycle callback interceptor method is the ejbCreate method, if the PreDestroy lifecycle callback interceptor method is the ejbRemove method, if the PostActivate lifecycle callback interceptor method is the ejbActivate method, or if the Pre-Passivate lifecycle callback interceptor method is the ejbPassivate method, these callback methods must be implemented on the bean class itself (or on its superclasses). 	 Test Name : tests.ejb.timer.ImplementsTimedObjectTest
	 Test Assertion : Timers can be created for stateless session beans, message-driven beans, and 2.1 entity beans.Timers cannot be created for stateful session beans or EJB 3.0 entities.Only 2.1 entity beans and stateless session beans may implement the TimedObject interface. Please refer to EJB 3.0 Specification Section #17.2   for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#GestorePiattoBean ]
[ Prova.GestorePiattoBean ] properly implements the TimedObject interface.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.session.TransactionDemarcationSessionSynchronizationInterface
	 Test Assertion : If an enterprise bean implements the javax.ejb.SessionSynchronization interface, the Application Assembler can specify only the following values for the transaction attributes of the bean's methods:  Required, RequiresNew, Mandatory. Please refer to EJB 3.0 Specification Section #12.3.7 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#GestorePiattoBean ]

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.session.TransientFieldsSerialization

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.ejb30.CallbacksOnBeanClass
	 Test Assertion : If the PostConstruct lifecycle callback interceptor method is the ejbCreate method, if the PreDestroy lifecycle callback interceptor method is the ejbRemove method, if the PostActivate lifecycle callback interceptor method is the ejbActivate method, or if the Pre-Passivate lifecycle callback interceptor method is the ejbPassivate method, these callback methods must be implemented on the bean class itself (or on its superclasses). Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #4.6.3 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#GestorePiattoBean ]

	 Test Name : tests.IconImageTypeTest
	 Test Assertion : The icon type contains small-icon and large-icon elements that specify the file names for small and large GIF, JPEG, or PNG icon images used to represent the parent element in a GUI tool. GIF, JPEG are supported till J2EE 1.4, PNG type has been introduced in JAVA EE 5. The specified files should be packaged inside the bundle containing this deployment descriptor. Please refer to J2EE 1.4 Platform Specification section #8.6 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#GestorePiattoBean ]

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.intf.localintf.LocalInterfaceMatchMethodException
	 Test Assertion : All the exceptions defined in the throws clause of the matching method of the enterprise bean class must be defined in the throws clause of the method of the local interface.  Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #4.6.9 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#GestoreLineaMagazzinoBean ]
Not Applicable because, EJB [ Prova.GestoreLineaMagazzinoBean ] does not have Local Interface.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.intf.localintf.LocalInterfaceMatchMethodReturn

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#GestoreLineaMagazzinoBean ]

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.elements.EjbLinkElement
	 Test Assertion : The referenced bean must be an enterprise bean in the same ear file. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #15.5.2 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#MateriaPrimaFacade ]
There are no EJB references to other beans within this bean [ MateriaPrimaFacade ].

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#MateriaPrimaFacade ]

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.ContainerTransactionStyle1

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#MateriaPrimaFacade ]

Not Applicable: Enterprise bean [ Prova.MagazzinoFacade ] has local interfaces only.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.homeintf.localhomeintf.LocalHomeMethodModifiers

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#MagazzinoFacade ]
Not Applicable: Enterprise bean [ Prova.MagazzinoFacade ] has local interfaces only.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.homeintf.localhomeintf.LocalHomeInterfacePublic

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#MagazzinoFacade ]
Not Applicable: Enterprise bean [ Prova.MagazzinoFacade ] has local interfaces only.

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#MagazzinoFacade ]
Not Applicable: Enterprise bean [ Prova.MagazzinoFacade ] has local interfaces only.

	 Test Assertion : Home can have arbitrary names but they must have a matching ejbHome[METHOD] method on the bean class. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #8.6.6 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#MagazzinoFacade ]

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#MagazzinoFacade ]
Not Applicable because, EJB [ Prova.MagazzinoFacade ] does not have Local Interface.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.intf.localintf.LocalInterfaceMatchMethodArgs
	 Test Assertion : For each method defined in the local interface, there must be a matching method in the enterprise bean class. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #4.6.9 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#MagazzinoFacade ]
Not Applicable because, EJB [ Prova.MagazzinoFacade ] does not have Local Interface.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.intf.localintf.LocalInterfaceMatchMethodException
	 Test Assertion : All the exceptions defined in the throws clause of the matching method of the enterprise bean class must be defined in the throws clause of the method of the local interface.  Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #4.6.9 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#MagazzinoFacade ]
Not Applicable because, EJB [ Prova.MagazzinoFacade ] does not have Local Interface.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.intf.localintf.LocalInterfaceMatchMethodReturn

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#MagazzinoFacade ]

	 Test Assertion : All the exceptions defined in the throws clause of the matching method of the enterprise bean class must be defined in the throws clause of the method of the local interface.  Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #4.6.9 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitureFacade ]
Not Applicable because, EJB [ Prova.FornitureFacade ] does not have Local Interface.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.intf.localintf.LocalInterfaceMatchMethodReturn
	 Test Assertion : For each method defined in the local interface, there must be a matching method in the enterprise bean class that has the same return type. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #4.6.9 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitureFacade ]
Not Applicable because, EJB [ Prova.FornitureFacade ] does not have Local Interface.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.intf.remoteintf.RemoteInterfaceClassExist
	 Test Assertion : Remote Interface must be available in application classpath. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #18.2 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitureFacade ]
Not Applicable because, EJB [ Prova.FornitureFacade ] does not have Remote Interface.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.intf.remoteintf.EjbRemoteInterfaceExtendsEJBObject
	 Test Assertion : Enterprise bean remote interface must extend the javax.ejb.EJBObject interface. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #4.6.7 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitureFacade ]
Not Applicable because, EJB [ Prova.FornitureFacade ] does not have Remote Interface.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.intf.remoteintf.RemoteInterfaceRmiIIOPException

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitureFacade ]
Not Applicable because, EJB [ Prova.FornitureFacade ] does not have Remote Interface.

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitureFacade ]
Not Applicable because, EJB [ Prova.FornitureFacade ] does not have Remote Interface.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.intf.remoteintf.RemoteInterfaceMatchMethodReturn

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitureFacade ]

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitureFacade ]

	 Test Assertion : The referenced bean must be an enterprise bean in the same ear file. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #15.5.2 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#PiattoFacade ]
There are no EJB references to other beans within this bean [ PiattoFacade ].

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.elements.MethodPermissionSecurityRoleExists
	 Test Assertion : Security roles used in method permission element must be defined in the roles element of the deployment descriptor. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #16.3.2 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#PiattoFacade ]
There are no role based method-permissions within this bean [ PiattoFacade ].

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.RoleNameNMTOKEN
	 Test Assertion : Role name conforms to lexical rules of NMTOKEN.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#PiattoFacade ]
No permissioned roles defined for this bean [ PiattoFacade ].

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.JarContainsXMLFile
	 Test Assertion : JAR file contains the XML-based deployment descriptor.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#PiattoFacade ]
Test is not applicable.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.ContainerTransactionStyle1
	 Test Assertion : There must be at most one container transaction element that uses the Style 1 "*" method name element for a given enterprise bean. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #12.3.7.2.1 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#PiattoFacade ]
There are no method permissions within this bean [ PiattoFacade ].

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.ContainerTransactionStyle2
	 Test Assertion : There must be at most one container transaction element that uses the Style 2 method element for a given method name. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #12.3.7.2.1 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#PiattoFacade ]
There are no container transactions within this bean [ PiattoFacade ].

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.session.createmethod.HomeInterfaceCreateMethodExceptionRemote
	 Test Assertion : Session bean home interface create methods must throw java.rmi.RemoteException. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #4.6.8 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#PiattoFacade ]
No remote home interface was found, test not applicable.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.session.BeanFieldsTransient
	 Test Assertion : Session bean class declares all fields as non-transient fields.  Please refer to EJB 3.0 Specification Section #4.2.1 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#PiattoFacade ]
Test is not applicable.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.SecurityIdentityRefs
	 Test Assertion : Security identity should reference a valid role-name.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#PiattoFacade ]
Bean [ PiattoFacade ] does not specify a run-as identity.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.ejb30.MDBInheritsMDB
	 Test Assertion : A message-driven bean class must not have a superclass that is itself a message-driven bean class. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #5.6.2 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#PiattoFacade ]
Test apply only to Message Bean components

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.ejb30.MDBImplementsListenerMethods
	 Test Assertion : The message driven bean class must implement the message listener interface or the methods of the message listener interface. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #5.6.2 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#PiattoFacade ]
Test apply only to Message Bean components

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.homeintf.HomeMethodRmiIIOPArgs
	 Test Assertion : Enterprise bean ejbHome[METHOD] method has valid RMI-IIOP parameter types.  Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #8.6.6 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitoreFacade ]
[ Prova.FornitoreFacade ] does not declare any ejbHome[METHOD] methods.  

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.homeintf.HomeMethodRmiIIOPReturn

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitoreFacade ]
[ Prova.FornitoreFacade ] does not declare any ejbHome[METHOD] methods.  

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.homeintf.localhomeintf.LocalHomeInterfaceClassExist
	 Test Assertion : LocalHome interface class must must be available in the application classpath. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #18.2 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitoreFacade ]
Not Applicable: Enterprise bean [ Prova.FornitoreFacade ] has local interfaces only.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.homeintf.localhomeintf.LocalHomeInterfaceExtendsEJBLocalHome

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitoreFacade ]
Not Applicable: Enterprise bean [ Prova.FornitoreFacade ] has local interfaces only.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.homeintf.localhomeintf.LocalHomeMethodNameMatch
	 Test Assertion : Home can have arbitrary names but they must have a matching ejbHome[METHOD] method on the bean class. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #8.6.6 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitoreFacade ]
Not Applicable: Enterprise bean [ Prova.FornitoreFacade ] has local interfaces only.

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitoreFacade ]

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.intf.localintf.LocalInterfaceMatchMethodArgs
	 Test Assertion : For each method defined in the local interface, there must be a matching method in the enterprise bean class. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #4.6.9 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitoreFacade ]
Not Applicable because, EJB [ Prova.FornitoreFacade ] does not have Local Interface.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.intf.localintf.LocalInterfaceMatchMethodException
	 Test Assertion : All the exceptions defined in the throws clause of the matching method of the enterprise bean class must be defined in the throws clause of the method of the local interface.  Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #4.6.9 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitoreFacade ]
Not Applicable because, EJB [ Prova.FornitoreFacade ] does not have Local Interface.

	 Test Name : tests.ejb.intf.localintf.LocalInterfaceMatchMethodReturn
	 Test Assertion : For each method defined in the local interface, there must be a matching method in the enterprise bean class that has the same return type. Please refer to EJB 3.0 "Core Contracts and Requirements" Specification Section #4.6.9 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitoreFacade ]
Not Applicable because, EJB [ Prova.FornitoreFacade ] does not have Local Interface.

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitoreFacade ]

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-ejb.jar#FornitoreFacade ]

	 Test Name : tests.web.TaglibFunctionSignatureIsValid
	 Test Assertion : The function-signature must be specified using a fully-qualified return type followed by the method name, followed by the fully-qualified argument types in parenthesis, separated by commas. Please refer to Section JSP.2.10.2 and APPENDIX JSP.C of JSP Specification version 2.1 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-war.war ]
function-signature element of the tag lib descriptor are properly defined.

	 Test Name : tests.IconImageTypeTest
	 Test Assertion : The icon type contains small-icon and large-icon elements that specify the file names for small and large GIF, JPEG, or PNG icon images used to represent the parent element in a GUI tool. GIF, JPEG are supported till J2EE 1.4, PNG type has been introduced in JAVA EE 5. The specified files should be packaged inside the bundle containing this deployment descriptor. Please refer to J2EE 1.4 Platform Specification section #8.6 for further information.
	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-war.war ]
No errors were detected.

	 Test Name : tests.web.PUMatchingEMandEMFRefTest
	 Test Assertion : For every entity manager referenced in the application, there must be a matching persistence unit defined using META-INF/persistence.xml file. Please refer to EJB 3.0 Persistence API Specification section #6.2 for further information.
	 Test Description : Persistence units that are visible to this component are [  ].

	 Test Description : For [ ProvaProgetto1#ProvaProgetto1-war.war ]
